sentence.content: Spike Lee may have been wearing a Georgetown University cap and sweatshirt, but he got a far warmer reception from Syracuse University students than he did from Academy Award voters.

sentence.content: In a lecture and question-and-answer session Monday, Lee shrugged off the academy&apost;s icy treatment of his latest movie, ``Do the Right Thing,&apost;&apost; and blamed it on generational politics.
